I've played this game for so long, and there is a reason that there is a pro scene for this game. Too many trolls, hackers, smurfs, whatever you can imagine. disgusting vac system rly struggles to get the hackers which are a pretty common occurence ,life leeching game that needs infinite hours of training for you to be considered ok, makes a good move of giving one the ability to kick trollers and afkers off the game  but then punishes he who kicks, lastly the ranking up system is just broken af you may need to  win 9 games in a row with 80+ points in order to get from gold 2 to 3 and once you get there 3 defeats are usually enough to drop you down no matter what individual score you may be getting
Please don't play this, I am better than you
